explains: n. 平衡的行为（或提议）；平衡物
v. 对……起平衡作用，抗衡

sentences.en: His no-inflation bill serves as a useful counterweight to proposals less acceptable to the committee.
sentences.cn: 相对于那些不太为该委员会接受的议案来说，他的无通货膨胀法案可作为一个有益平衡。

sentences.en: Early learning can be an important counterweight.
sentences.cn: 早期的学习是至关重要的。

sentences.en: Between 2001 and 2008 it acted as a useful counterweight to the credit cycle.
sentences.cn: 在2001到2008年间，它做法看起来是用来平衡信用循环。
